display_long_description:
Welcome to the future of email. Spike turns email into simple conversations, so you can work and collaborate seamlessly with clients and team members—in a more natural way.

Spike takes email communication and collaboration to the next level. We take the best parts of messenger, business chat, and workflow tools and combine it in one place, your email inbox. Making it  simple and seamless to get your work done, from anywhere and with anyone. 

With Spike, you will enjoy:

* Unified Inbox for personal and work accounts
* Simple file management
* Team chats
* Synced calendar
* Reminders 
* Interactive notes & to do’s
* Video meetings
* Voice messaging
* And much more

Experience all the essential work tools from your inbox in a virtual environment: Your email, chat, calls, notes, tasks and to do’s, into a single centralized hub. So you can finally be in control, simplify your work life, and be more productive—whether working remotely or in the office.
